actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

official_title: To extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Oregon.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to extend for a specified maximum period the time required for the construction of a certain hydroelectric project in the State of Oregon.

titles.title: To extend the deadline under the Federal Power Act applicable to the construction of a hydroelectric project in the State of Oregon.
